articles.author: Chris Boyette, Keith Allen
articles.title: Palestinian-American boy killed and his mother injured after landlord stabs them because they were Muslim, authorities say - CNN
articles.description: A Chicago-area landlord was arrested and charged with murder and hate crimes after authorities said he stabbed and killed a 6-year-old boy and seriously wounded his mother, allegedly because the tenants are Muslim.
